about_the_game:
WARNING: This game may trigger seizures to people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

Note: The game focuses on exploration and slowly increases tension to create a deeper and more meaningful experience. It is supplemented by light, loud and sudden sounds. Take into account that it makes you feel a lot of fear and is a difficult game. Christmas Night is a first person psychological horror game.

Environment:
The game takes place in a house in a small town in Cordova, Alaska. A 12-year-old little girl lives in this house with her mother.

The Plot:
The moment the little girl had been waiting for finally came. The tree was decorated, preparations were made and the desired wishes were made. Even though you've been good all year, you're going to have to do more to get the gift you wanted and not be on Santa's spoilers list.

- Will tonight go as Vanessa planned? The Christmas Eve she had been waiting impatiently for turned into a disaster for the little girl.
- If you want your gift, listen to what Santa says and do it to the letter.
- Your mother may have left you alone at home, but the mysteries of Christmas will not leave you alone.

Developer's comment about the game:
We recommend that people who are afraid of the dark, have a heart condition, and are afraid of being alone should not play alone.

Disclaimer:
This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, places and events are purely the product of imagination or are used fictionally. Any resemblance to real events, places, living or dead people is purely coincidental.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® CoreTM2 Quad 2.7 Ghz or better, AMD PhenomTM II X4 3 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standart audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standart audio device

short_description: Christmas Night is a story-themed horror game about Christmas and its beliefs. Will we be rewarded for being a good girl this Christmas or will we be punished for being a spoiled person?
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
